title: Lime & garlic chicken with roasted cauliflower

ingredients.item: 330g pack essential Waitrose British Chicken Breast Chunks
1 essential Waitrose Cauliflower, cut into small florets
1 tbsp Kalamata olive & sun-dried tomato tapenade

instructions.step: Preheat the oven to 200Â°C, gas mark 6. Mix together the lime zest, juice and garlic and add the chicken (cut any large pieces in half). Set aside.
Place the cauliflower, onion, pepper, chives and seeds on a large baking tray and toss in the tapenade and oil. Roast for 20 minutes or until tender.

Meanwhile, thread the chicken onto 4 skewers and place under a preheated grill for 12-15 minutes, turning occasionally or until cooked through with no pink meat. Serve the kebabs with the cauliflower.
